plays.text: Penalty to Gary Suter 2 minutes for Interference Brad May

Penalty to Krystofer Kolanos 2 minutes for Roughing Teemu Selanne
Penalty to Teemu Selanne 2 minutes for Roughing Krystofer Kolanos
Penalty to Scott Hannan 2 minutes for Holding Shane Doan
Penalty to Shane Doan 2 minutes for Roughing Scott Hannan
Penalty to Daniel Briere 2 minutes for Tripping Owen Nolan
